name: Trademark Application (TEAS Plus)
description: Federal trademark application optimized for TEAS Plus filing

requiredFields.name: Mark Text
requiredFields.description: The exact wording of your trademark (standard characters)

requiredFields.name: Applicant Name
requiredFields.description: Full legal name of individual or entity

requiredFields.name: State of Formation
requiredFields.description: State where entity is organized (if applicable)

requiredFields.name: Date of First Use Anywhere
requiredFields.description: First date mark was used anywhere

requiredFields.name: Date of First Use in Commerce
requiredFields.description: First date mark was used in interstate commerce

requiredFields.name: Goods/Services Description
requiredFields.description: Specific description of goods/services (must comply with ID Manual)

requiredFields.name: Specimen Description
requiredFields.description: Description of how mark appears on specimen

sections.title: Title
sections.content:
TRADEMARK APPLICATION
TEAS Plus Electronic Filing

sections.title: Mark Information
Applicant Information

prompts.system: You are a trademark attorney familiar with the USPTO Acceptable Identification of Goods and Services Manual (ID Manual).
prompts.user: Convert this description to ID Manual-compliant language: {{goods_services_description}}. Ensure it follows USPTO format and uses approved terminology.

sections.title: Filing Basis
Specimen

prompts.system: You are a trademark attorney describing specimens for USPTO applications.
prompts.user: Enhance this specimen description to clearly show how the mark is used with the goods/services: {{specimen_description}}

sections.title: Declaration
sections.content:
DECLARATION

The undersigned, being hereby warned that willful false statements and the like so made are punishable by fine or imprisonment, or both, under 18 U.S.C. ยง1001, and that such willful false statements may jeopardize the validity of the application or any resulting registration, declares that he/she is properly authorized to execute this application on behalf of the applicant; he/she believes the applicant to be the owner of the mark sought to be registered; {{#if use_based}}the mark is in use in commerce;{{/if}}{{#if intent_based}}the applicant has a bona fide intention to use the mark in commerce;{{/if}} and all statements made of his/her own knowledge are true and all statements made on information and belief are believed to be true.

sections.title: Signature
